alert.note: Alert for Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 11 at 3:05AM PDT until May 11 at 10:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PDT THIS MORNING... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 3 AM PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected with a late morning through mid afternoon lull. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast. * WHEN...For the first Wind Advisory, until 10 AM PDT this morning. For the second Wind Advisory, from 5 PM this afternoon to 3 AM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
